summary.span: 表示一个标签控件，该控件在网页上显示文本。

span.span: Represents a label control, which displays text on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [简介Introduction](#introduction) - [辅助功能Accessibility](#accessibility) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 简介Introduction 使用 控件在页面上的设置位置中显示文本。Use the control to display text in a set location on the page. 与静态文本不同，您可以通过属性自定义显示的文本 。Unlike static text, you can customize the displayed text through the property. 您还可以使用 和 控件在 Web 窗体页上显示文本。You can also use the and controls to display text on the Web Forms page. 但是，与控件不同的是 ，这些控件不呈现任何其他标记。However, unlike the control, these controls do not render any additional tags. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This control can be used to display user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). ## 可访问性Accessibility 有关如何配置此控件以生成符合辅助功能标准的标记的信息，请参阅 [Visual Studio 中的辅助功能和 ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) 和 [ASP.NET 控件和辅助功能](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140))。For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms228004(v=vs.140)) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/ms227996(v=vs.140)). ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 在网页上创建控件。The following example demonstrates how to create a control on a Web page. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 ASP.NET 网页代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the ASP.NET Web page code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Label Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Label Example 2/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Label Example 2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Label Example 2/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此构造函数创建并初始化类的新实例 。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建和初始化控件的新实例 。The following example shows how to create and initialize a new instance of the control. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). param.name: writer
param.span: 表示在客户端上呈现 HTML 内容的输出流的 。

summary.span: 添加要呈现到指定输出流的 控件的 HTML 特性和样式。

span.span: Adds the HTML attributes and styles of a control to render to the specified output stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法主要由控件开发人员用来将其他特性和样式插入控件的 输出流中 。The method is used primarily by control developers to insert the additional attributes and styles to the output stream for a control. 控件的方法 确定是 `for` 应使用值添加特性 ，还是应应用内联块样式来显示边框样式和宽度。The method for a control determines whether the `for` attribute should be added with the value, and if the inline-block style should be applied to display the border style and width.

exception.span: 未能找到 属性中指定的控件。

span.span: The control specified in the property cannot be found.

summary.span: 通知控件某元素已经过分析，并将该元素添加到 控件。

span.span: Notifies the control that an element was parsed and adds the element to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此 方法主要由控件开发人员从类派生自定义控件时使用 。The method is used primarily by control developers when deriving a custom control from the class. 如果输入对象是 ，并且 控件没有子控件，则输入对象用于设置 控件的属性 。If the input object is a , and the control has no child controls, the input object is used to set the property of the control. 否则，将 调用基类的方法 ，并将指定的对象添加到 集合中。Otherwise, the method of the base class is called and the specified object is added to the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写 自定义服务器控件中的方法 ，以便它始终将 text 属性设置为已分析对象的 text 属性，如果已分析的对象为 ，则为; 否则为空字符串。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method in a custom server control so that it always sets the text property to the parsed object's text property, if the parsed object is a , and to an empty string otherwise. [!code-aspx-csharp[CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_label_addparsedsubobjectcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_label_addparsedsubobjectvb.aspx#1)] [!code-csharp[CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject/CS/custom_label_addparsedsubobject.cs#2)] [!code-vb[CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CustomLabelAddParsedSubObject/VB/custom_label_addparsedsubobject.vb#2)]

.property instance string AssociatedControlID

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件关联的服务器控件的标识符。

span.span: Gets or sets the identifier for a server control that the control is associated with.

value.span: 一个字符串，对应于 Web 窗体中包含的服务器控件的 。

span.span: A string value corresponding to the for a server control contained in the Web form.

value.span: 默认值为空字符串 ("")，指示 控件不与其他服务器控件相关联。

span.span: The default is an empty string (""), indicating that the control is not associated with another server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性将 控件与 Web 窗体上的其他服务器控件相关联。Use the property to associate a control with another server control on a Web form. 当 控件与其他服务器控件关联时，它的特性可用于扩展关联控件的功能。When a control is associated with another server control, its attributes can be used to extend the functionality of the associated control. 您可以使用该 控件作为另一个控件的标题，或者可以设置关联控件的 tab 键索引或热键。You can use the control as a caption for another control, or you can set the tab index or hot key for an associated control. 设置属性后， 控件将呈现为 HTML `label` 元素，并将 `for` 特性设置为 关联控件的属性。When the property is set, the control renders as an HTML `label` element, with the `for` attribute set to the property of the associated control. 您可以使用属性来设置元素的其他特性 `label` 。You can set other attributes of the `label` element using the properties. 例如，你可以使用 和 属性来提供关联控件的标题和热键。For example, you can use the and properties to provide the caption and hot key for an associated control. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

span.span: An object that contains the saved view state values for the control.

summary.span: 加载以前保存的控件的状态。

span.span: Loads the previously saved state for the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法主要由 .NET Framework 基础结构使用，不应在代码中直接使用。This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code. 不过，控件开发人员可以重写此方法，以指定自定义服务器控件如何还原其视图状态。However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET 状态管理概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/75x4ha6s(v=vs.100)). 方法 从方法保存的上一个页请求还原控件的视图状态信息 。The method restores view-state information for the control from a previous page request that was saved by the method.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示在控件的 属性为 时，控件是否应将呈现的 HTML 元素的 特性设置为 "disabled"。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's property is .

value.span: 如果 属性指示 ASP.NET 版本低于 4.0，则为; 否则为 。

span.span: if the property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than 4.0; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示在控件被禁用时 ASP.NET 应如何呈现控件的 HTML。This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `true` ，则 `disabled` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled. 如果此属性为 `false` ，则 `class` 在禁用控件时，ASP.NET 将呈现属性。If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可确定 与控件相关联的值 。Use the property to determine the value that is associated with a control. 此 属性主要由控件开发人员使用。The property is used primarily by control developers.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的文本内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the text content of the control.
The text content of the control.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性来指定或确定控件的文本内容 。Use the property to specify or determine the text content of the control. 此属性通常用于以编程方式自定义控件中显示的文本 。This property is commonly used to programmatically customize the text that is displayed in the control. 属性可以包含 HTML。The property can include HTML. 如果是这样，则在浏览器中不会以任何方式传递 HTML，其中，可以解释为标记而不是文本。If it does, the HTML will be passed unchanged to the browser, where is might be interpreted as markup and not as text. 如果希望浏览器以纯文本形式显示 HTML 标记，可以使用 方法，如类概述的示例中所示。If you want the browser to display HTML markup as plain text, you can use the method, as shown in the example for the class overview. 你还可以使用 控件而不是 控件，并将属性设置 为 。You can also use the control instead of the control, and set the property to . > [!NOTE] > 设置 属性将清除控件中包含的任何其他控件 。Setting the property will clear any other controls contained in the control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此控件可用于显示用户输入，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This control can be used to display user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)). 此属性是 对象在运行时绑定到的默认属性。This property is the default property that a object binds to at run time. 有关详细信息，请参阅 、 和 [对数据源控件使用参数进行筛选](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/xt50s8kz(v=vs.100))。For more information, see , , and [Using Parameters with Data Source Controls for Filtering](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/xt50s8kz(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建控件的新实例 并设置其 属性。The following example demonstrates how to create a new instance of the control and set its property. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件中，则可能无法正常工作。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 必须将此代码示例复制到扩展名为 .aspx 的空文本文件中。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关 Web 窗体代码模型的详细信息，请参阅 [ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100))。For more information on the Web Forms code model, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/015103yb(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[Classic Label.Text Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Label.Text Example/CS/sourcecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Classic Label.Text Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Classic Label.Text Example/VB/sourcevb.aspx#1)]
